Code.description:
Identifies the success or failure of the transaction. 
1 = Successful
0 = Failure

Description.description: Describes Response Status Code. Returns text of Success.

Code.description: Warning code returned by the system.

Description.description: Warning messages returned by the system

Alert.description: Alert Container. There can be zero to many alert containers with code and description.

CustomerContext.description: The CustomerContext Information which will be echoed during response.

TransactionIdentifier.description: The Unique TransactionIdentifier Information for that transaction. This will be present only if requested in the request.

Code.description:
Code to indicate the type of Inquiry Number. 

Package:
For package this element returns: 
01 -Shipment Identification Number

Mail Innovations: 
03- Mail Innovation tracking number

Freight:
HAWB - House Airway Bill
HBL - House Bill of Lading
PRO  PRO Number
SUBPRO  Sub-PRO Number
DO  Delivery Order

Description.description: Description of the Inquiry Number as indicated by code as above.

Value.description: The actual value of the Inquiry Number.

Code.description:
This element will be used to indicate the type of the shipment being tracked, either Package, Mail Innovations or Freight.
01 - Package
02 - Freight
03 - Mail Innovations

ShipmentType.description: Container for the type of Shipment.

CandidateBookmark.description:
During Tracking and Reference Number searches, it is possible that duplicate shipments will be found. 

If duplicate shipments are found, then a Candidate Summary with a corresponding Base64 encodedCandidate Bookmark for each of the Shipments will be returned in the response. 

The Candidate Bookmark can be passed back to the tracking web service in a separate track transaction to retrieve tracking information about the particular shipment of interest.

ShipperNumber.description: The shippers UPS account number that placed this shipment

Code.description:
Code of Document Type.
04 - POD Letter
05 - Electronic Delivery Letter
**Returned if customer has authorized release of the package with the signature.

AddressLine.description: Activity locations street address including name and number (when applicable) and/or building floor, room, suite, and PO Box number. Up to three AddressLine can be returned.

City.description: City name. This is optional for Mail Innovations

StateProvinceCode.description: Activity locations state or province code. This is optional for Mail Innovations.

CountryCode.description: Activity locations country or territory code.

ShipmentAddress.description: An array of addresses associated with this shipment.

Code.description: Package weight unit of measurement code.

UnitOfMeasurement.description: Shipment weight unit of measurement container.

Weight.description: Shipments total weight. Set to 0 for shipment with package type of letter.

Code.description: Service Code. For valid values, see Service Codes in the Appendix.

Service.description: Container for UPS service associated with the shipment

Code.description: Package Reference number type code. The code specifies the Reference name.
Code for the current status of the shipment.

Description.description: Description of the current status of the shipment.

CurrentStatus.description: Container for the current status of the shipment.

PickupDate.description: Date the shipment was picked-up. Format: YYYYMMDD

Code.description:
Code of Document Type.
04 - POD Letter
05 - Electronic Delivery Letter
**Returned if customer has authorized release of the package with the signature.

Type.description: The type of service center for freight shipment.

City.description: City name. This is optional for Mail Innovations

StateProvinceCode.description: Activity locations state or province code. This is optional for Mail Innovations.

Description.description: A description is return to indicate the scheduled delivery date is unavailable

DeliveryDateUnavailable.description:
DeliveryDate Unavailable container.
Note: This container is return if SubVersion is 0114 and above.

Code.description:
Code of Document Type.
04 - POD Letter
05 - Electronic Delivery Letter
**Returned if customer has authorized release of the package with the signature.

Date.description: The delivery date. Format: YYYYMMDD (military format)

Code.description: Package weight unit of measurement code.

Description.description: Description of the package weight measurement units.

Value.description: Value of the total volume of the shipment.

Volume.description: Container for the volume of freight Shipment.

BillToName.description: Name of the person to whom the shipment is billed to.

Code.description:
Code of Document Type.
04 - POD Letter
05 - Electronic Delivery Letter
**Returned if customer has authorized release of the package with the signature.

MonetaryValue.description: Cash On Delivery (COD) Amount that is due.

COD.description: Container for COD for the shipment.

SignedForByName.description: Person that received the shipment. May be the addressee, or another person that signed for the shipment

AddressLine.description: Activity locations street address including name and number (when applicable) and/or building floor, room, suite, and PO Box number. Up to three AddressLine can be returned.

City.description: City name. This is optional for Mail Innovations

StateProvinceCode.description: Activity locations state or province code. This is optional for Mail Innovations.

CountryCode.description: Activity locations country or territory code.

Type.description: Type of facility for Mail Innovations shipment.

Code.description: This code is associated with the Mail Innovations facility.

TransportFacility.description: This container is for storing the type and code of the transport facility associated with the Mail Innovations activity.

Code.description: Activity location code.

SignedForByName.description: Name of the person who signed.

Date.description:
Date of activity. 
Military format: YYYYMMDD

Time.description:
Time of activity. 
Military format: HHMMSS or HHMM

Date.description: Date of the Estimated Departure Time Stamp at the origin port. Format: YYYYMMDD

Time.description: Time of the Estimated Departure Time Stamp at the origin port. Format: HHMMSS

EstimatedDeparture.description: Container for Estimated Departure Time Stamp at the origin port.

OriginPortDetail.description: Details of origin port of the shipment.

Date.description: Container for Estimated Arrival Time Stamp at the Destination Port. Format: YYYYMMDD

Time.description: Time of the Estimated Arrival Time Stamp at the Destination Port. Format: HHMMSS

EstimatedArrival.description: Container for Estimated Arrival Time Stamp at the Destination Port

DestinationPortDetail.description: Container for the destination port of the shipment.

DescriptionOfGoods.description: Description of Goods in the shipment.

Date.description: Cargo Ready date for the shipment. Format: YYYYMMDD

Time.description: Cargo Ready time for the shipment. Format: HHMMSS

CargoReady.description: Container for cargo ready date and time.

Date.description: Manifest date for the shipment. Format: YYYYMMDD

Time.description: Manifest time for the shipment. Format: HHMMSS

Manifest.description: Container for Manifest date and time.

Description.description: Description of the carrier e.g: Flight or Vessel.

Date.description: Date of the arrival time stamp. Format: YYYYMMDD

Time.description: Time of the arrival time stamp. Format: HHMMSS

Arrival.description: Container for arrival time stamp information of the carrier

Date.description: Date of the arrival time stamp. Format: YYYYMMDD

Time.description: Time of the arrival time stamp. Format: HHMMSS

Departure.description: Container for Departure time stamp information of the carrier

OriginPort.description: Origin Port of the Carriers leg of the journey

DestinationPort.description: Destination Port of the Carriers leg of the journey

CarrierActivityInformation.description: Container for carrier activity information for the shipment.

Code.description:
Code of Document Type.
04 - POD Letter
05 - Electronic Delivery Letter
**Returned if customer has authorized release of the package with the signature.

Content.description: Base64 Encoded PODLetter in html format or the customer's name for Electronic Delivery Notice.

Code.description:
Format code of the content.
03 - HTML
04 - Plain text

Description.description:
Description of Format code above. 
Plain text format will only apply if the code above is 04.

Document.description:
Container for the various documents returned to the customer.

Returned if Signature Tracking is enabled and authorized.
Returned if any of the documents i.e., Signature, Free Astrays, Delivery Receipt or POD is requested using the request option. 
Not returned for documents like SCS Freight, UPS Freight TL/LTL.

Refer to the Request Option Matrix in the Appendix.

Made.description: Container for Appointment Made Date and Time.

Requested.description: Container for Appointment Requested Date and Time

DeliveryIndicator.description: Returns "Y" if packagehas been delivered, and "N" if it has not.

DeliveryDate.description: The delivery date of the package. Will be returned if delivery date indicator is Y .The format is: YYYYMMDD

Date.description:
Estimated delivery date of the package
Format: YYYY-MM-DD

StartTime.description:
Estimated delivery Start Time.
Format: hh:mm:ss

EndTime.description:
Estimated delivery End Time.
Format: hh:mm:ss

EstimatedDeliveryWindow.description:
Container for Estimated Delivery Window. Will be available only for authorized users.
Note: This container is returned if SubVersion is 1907 and above.

SRSizeCode.description:
Simple Rate package size.
Valid Values:
XS
S
M
L
XL 
Note: This container is return if SubVersion is 1909 or above

PickupDate.description:
The last date the package is held for pickup at a UPS Access Point. Date of the arrival time stamp. 
Format: YYYYMMDD

Redirect.description:
Container tag for Redirect package to UPS Access Point
Note: This container is return if SubVersion is 0114 or above

Code.description:
Code of Document Type.
04 - POD Letter
05 - Electronic Delivery Letter
**Returned if customer has authorized release of the package with the signature.

Date.description: The delivery date. Format: YYYYMMDD (military format)

Code.description:
Code of Document Type.
04 - POD Letter
05 - Electronic Delivery Letter
**Returned if customer has authorized release of the package with the signature.

AddressLine.description: Activity locations street address including name and number (when applicable) and/or building floor, room, suite, and PO Box number. Up to three AddressLine can be returned.

City.description: City name. This is optional for Mail Innovations

StateProvinceCode.description: Activity locations state or province code. This is optional for Mail Innovations.

CountryCode.description: Activity locations country or territory code.

Code.description:
Code of Document Type.
04 - POD Letter
05 - Electronic Delivery Letter
**Returned if customer has authorized release of the package with the signature.

Value.description:
PackageServiceOption Type Code values:
04 = R - Commercial Invoice Removal Requested or S - Commercial Invoice Removal Success. 
06 = USPS Package Identification number that is returned for UPS Returns Flexible Access Shipments.
07 = The specific product description. 
09 = R  Return Exchange Requested or S - Exchange Completed.

MonetaryValue.description: Cash On Delivery (COD) Amount that is due.

Code.description: The status code.

ControlNumber.description: Barcode COD Control Number or UPS imprinted Control Number.

COD.description:
COD container at package level. 
Refer to the Request Option Matrix in the Appendix.

Value.description: This contains value of the alternate tracking number.

AddressLine.description: Activity locations street address including name and number (when applicable) and/or building floor, room, suite, and PO Box number. Up to three AddressLine can be returned.

City.description: City name. This is optional for Mail Innovations

StateProvinceCode.description: Activity locations state or province code. This is optional for Mail Innovations.

CountryCode.description: Activity locations country or territory code.

Type.description: Type of facility for Mail Innovations shipment.

Code.description: This code is associated with the Mail Innovations facility.

TransportFacility.description: This container is for storing the type and code of the transport facility associated with the Mail Innovations activity.

Code.description: Activity location code.

SignedForByName.description: Name of the person who signed.

Type.description:
Type of activity status:
I = In Transit
D = Delivered
X = Exception
P = Pickup
M = Manifest Pickup.

Code.description: The status code.

Date.description:
Date of activity. 
Military format: YYYYMMDD

Time.description:
Time of activity. 
Military format: HHMMSS or HHMM

DeliveryDateFromManifestIndicator.description:
The presence of this indicator means manifest information is available and used to calculate the expected delivery date. 
This will be available when Track sub version >=1507

Date.description:
Date of activity. 
Military format: YYYYMMDD

Time.description:
Time of activity.
Military format: HHMMSS or HHMM

NextScheduleActivity.description:
Container tag to describe when the next schedule activity will occur.
Note: This container is return if SubVersion is 0114 and above

GMTDate.description:
Date of activity. Format: YYYY-MM-DD
Note: This container is return if SubVersion is 1907 and above.

GMTTime.description:
Time of activity. Format: hh:mm:ss or hh:mm
Note: This container is return if SubVersion is 1907 and above.

GMTOffset.description:
GMT Offset of activity for the time zone. Format: (+/-)hh:mm
Note: This container is return if SubVersion is 1907 and above.

Code.description:
Code of Document Type.
04 - POD Letter
05 - Electronic Delivery Letter
**Returned if customer has authorized release of the package with the signature.

Content.description: Base64 Encoded PODLetter in html format or the customer's name for Electronic Delivery Notice.

Code.description:
Format code of the content.
03 - HTML
04 - Plain text

Description.description:
Description of Format code above. 
Plain text format will only apply if the code above is 04.

Document.description:
Documents at package activity level.
Example: PODLetter

Refer to the Request Option Matrix in the Appendix.

Code.description: Code describing what type of message the customer can receive.
Package weight unit of measurement code.

Description.description: Description of the package weight measurement units.

UnitOfMeasurement.description: Container for package weight unit of measurement.

Weight.description: Packages weight. Set to 0 for package type of letters.

Code.description: Package Reference number type code. The code specifies the Reference name.

ReferenceNumber.description: Container for package reference number. Up to 20 reference numbers can be returned.

AlternateTrackingNumber.description: Alternate tracking number returned for this package.

Value.description: This contains value of the alternate tracking number.

AlternateTrackingInfo.description: Alternate tracking number returned for this package.

DimensionalWeightScanIndicator.description:
Present if Dimensional Weight Scan is used to recalculate schedule delivery date.
Note: This Indicator is return if SubVersion is 1407 and above.

ReturnEligibilityIndicator.description:
Contains Eligibility of the original package to initiate the return process via the given url.
Valid values are :
Y - Eligible
N - Not Eligible

ReturnExpirationDate.description: Contains the last date at which the original package can request a return process via the given url.

ReturnRequestURL.description: Contains the url that can be used to initiate the return process.

OriginalTrackingNumber.description: Contains the tracking number of the original package.

ReturnTrackingNumber.description: Contains the tracking number of the return package.

PreauthorizedReturnInformation.description: Container for the Pre-authorized For Return Information. If this information is requested and available, then this container will be populated for small packages and Mail Innovation packages.

Code.description: The status code.

Status.description: Container returning the quantum view notification status information.

Code.description:
Distinct code for the error returned.   
Possible error codes and descriptions are: 
- QVN1001 The provided failure email address is not in the proper format. 
- QVN1002 The failure email address exceeds the maximum character limit.
- QVN1005 The language code must be two-character long
- QVN1007 The language dialect must be two-character long  
- QVN1003 The provided Recipient Email Address is not in the proper format.
- QVN1004 The Recipient Email Address exceeds the maximum character limit.
- QVN1005 The language code must be two-character long. 
- QVN1007 The language dialect must be two-character long.  
- QVN1008 The language code and language dialect pair is invalid. 
- QVN1009 The package is delivered QVN1010 Unknown Error

Description.description: Description of the error, see above.

TrackingNumber.description: The tracking number of the package to which this failure detail applies to.

FailureDetail.description: Details of the errors occurred while requesting QV notification.

QuantumViewNotification.description: Container returned when quantum view notification is requested.
